modShortDescription: This mod adds 2 extra grenade types that are unlocked the same way as the vanilla grenades: 1 steel timed grenade and 1 steel contact grenade.
modDescription:
This mod adds 2 extra grenade types that are unlocked the same way as the vanilla [grenades](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/):

* 1 steel timed grenade
* 1 steel contact grenade

**These grenades:**

* Can be very dangerous to use and cause block damage and destruction (earth -> wood -> stone -> metal, in that order of destructive potential), unlike vanilla grenades.
* Are not as powerful as vanilla TNT.
* Have an extra layer of steel, so they are heavier and harder to throw.
* Can be crafted, looted, or bought from traders.

## Changelog

Conversion to A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a20/tree/main/Doughs-Buff-Grenades)** for A20  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a19/tree/main/Doughs-Buff-Grenades)** for A19

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).
